options.content: Boavizta Cloud-Scanner - Environmental impacts of EC2 instances and block storage

Cloud-scanner returns environmental impacts of your AWS usage.

It combines real time inventory and usage data from an AWS account with impact data from Boavizta API.

## Resource considered

- EC2 instances (type and CPU load)
- Block storage (type and size)

## Indicators

- üî• Global Warming Potential - GWP (CO2eq)
- ‚ö° Primary Energy - PE (KWH or Mega Joules)
- üåç Abiotic Depletion Potential - ADP: resources like mineral, water (kgSbeq)

## Scopes

- Use (displayed here for **one hour** of use)
- Embodied impacts (i.e. manufacture related impacts, amortized for one hour of use)

## Data and methodology

- https://boavizta.github.io/cloud-scanner/
- https://www.boavizta.org/en
- https://boavizta.org/en/blog/empreinte-de-la-fabrication-d-un-serveur
